channel.title: Ryzen on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ryzen on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Framework Laptop 16 update brings Nvidia GeForce to the modular gaming laptop
item.description: Older Ryzen 7040-based model will stick around at $1,299 as a lower-end option.

item.title: Like Intel before it, AMD blames motherboard makers for burnt-out CPUs
item.description: Users of X3D CPUs in ASRock motherboards seem to be at particularly high risk.
